metadata.title: CVE-2018-10243 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: htp_parse_authorization_digest in htp_parsers.c in LibHTP 0.5.26 allows remote attackers to cause a heap-based buffer over-read via an authorization digest header.

criterions.comment: htp package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
libhtp package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
